item.title: Vim does that already
item.author: taylor@teukka.tech (taylor thompson)
item.description: Power to Productivity Vim is a powerful tool which helps you stay productive and spend less time doing the mechanical work of coding. For many, Vim seems archaic, under-featured, or even intimidating. I hope to illustrate that Vim none of those things, but is in fact a great editor for nearly every development environment. I want to focus on three common tasks where Vim helps you be more productive without leaving your editor.
